meta.title: Website Development in Minsk | ITshka
meta.description: Website development in Minsk and Minsk region. We make the website first — you pay later!

hero.subtitle: No risks.
hero.subtitleText: You see the result before payment.

bonus.title: Personal consultation
bonus.description: We work with businesses in Minsk and Minsk region. We'll find a solution for you

modal.iKnow: I know what my project should be
modal.iKnowDesc: Fill out the brief with description
modal.iDontKnow: I don't know what my project should be
modal.contactFormDesc: Leave your contacts and we'll call you to discuss the project
modal.name: Name
modal.weWillCall: We'll call back within 15 minutes during business hours
modal.successDesc: Your request has been sent. We will contact you shortly.
modal.hasLogo: Do you have a logo and brand identity?

briefNew.commonHint: Fill in only what you understand. If you're not sure — just leave the field empty.
briefNew.step1Intro: Start with the basic information. It's totally fine to fill the next steps only partially.
briefNew.almostDoneText: Click “Send” and we will contact you soon

company.subtitle: Tell us about yourself in simple words

marketing.subtitle: What you do and for whom

tasks.title: Goals
tasks.subtitle: What you expect from the website

content.title: Content

fields.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: What exactly is needed: landing, corporate site, store...
fields.goalsPlaceholder: For example: more leads, strong presentation website
fields.existingSitePlaceholder: Link to your current site or “none”
fields.competitorsPlaceholder: Links to competitors' websites (if you know)
fields.timelinePlaceholder: For example: 1–2 months, by a specific date
fields.mainPageStructurePlaceholder: What should be on top, what goes below
fields.contentReadinessPlaceholder: Do you have texts and photos? Do you need our help?
fields.brandStylePlaceholder: Do you have logo and brandbook?
fields.positiveSitesPlaceholder: Links and what exactly you like
fields.negativeSitesPlaceholder: Links and what exactly doesn't fit
fields.updateFrequencyPlaceholder: How often do you plan to change information?
fields.hostingNeededPlaceholder: For example: yes, please choose and set up
fields.supportNeededPlaceholder: Do you need ongoing technical support?
fields.promotionPlannedPlaceholder: Do you plan to promote the website?
fields.promotionCalculationPlaceholder: If you need estimate — write keywords or topic
fields.otherRequirementsPlaceholder: Any other details that are important to consider

footer.tagline: We create websites that work for your business
